document.full_text: the trustee for bankrupt thornburg mortgage inc has sued goldman sachs, barclays and other big banks for a combined $2.2 billion, blaming them for the former home loan company's bankruptcy.
document.title: thornburg trustee sues big banks for $2.2 billion
lines_and_colors: the trustee for bankrupt thornburg mortgage inc has sued goldman sachs, barclays and other big banks for a combined $2.2 billion, blaming them for the former home loan company's bankruptcy.
